case: N.F.114 DisDark Web Series of Events
info: A Sinner adept at Physical Output. Deals Core Damage when casting an Ultimate.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Possibility
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: Every time 000 uses [Hack], [Zero Domain Storm], or [Kyouran Overflow] to damage enemies, she will data breach them. Data breach progress can be accumulated. The higher their data breach progress, the more damage 000 will deal to them, up to 25% / 35% / 45% more. After their data breach progress reaches critical value, every part of [Zero Domain Storm] will deal an additional (Attack * 100%) Physical Damage to them and cause them to take  5% / 10% / 15% increased damage, lasting for the entire battle.

media.title: [Eng CC] 2nd Anniversary S-rank Umbra | 000 "Dark Web Phantom" Character Trailer
media.author: Jiu Jiu subs

shackles.title: Anonymous Access
shackles.description: Energy gained from [Kyouran Overflow] increased by 1. After [Kyouran Overflow] is used, 000 gains a 15% Attack Speed increase, lasting for 6 seconds.

shackles.title: Data Hijack
shackles.description: The original damage coefficient dealt by [Geist Invasion] is increased by 10% and the duration is extended by 4 seconds.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: 000 gains 18 energy at the start of battle.

skills.name: Hack
skills.description: 000 uses data rings to attack, each hit dealing (Attack * 71%) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Zero Domain Storm
skills.description: 000 moves to target grid, attacking all enemies within skill range three times, dealing a total of (Attack * 930%) Physical Damage and X Core Damage. [Zero Domain Storm] can be charged up to X times.

skills.name: Geist Invasion
skills.description: Unlocks second Ultimate [Geist Invasion]. 000 enters projection form. Under projection form, after 000 uses [Hack], [Zero Domain Storm], or [Kyouran Overflow], the effect will additionally be triggered twice, dealing 15.6% of the original damage, lasting for 12 seconds.

skills.name: Kyouran Overflow
skills.description: Every time after 000 has used [Hack] 9 times, she controls her data rings to slice surrounding enemies, dealing (Attack * 264%) Physical Damage to all enemies within skill range, then gains 1 energy. The release of this ability is affected by Attack Speed bonuses.

criminalRecord: In N.F. 114, consecutive malicious dark web-related incidents broke out in the city. All incidents were catalysed by Mania. It is possible that a criminal organisation was behind this. The subject is active behind the dark web and is closely linked to this series of events.
mutationAssessment: Attempts to measure the subject's ability produced abnormal results. Forced intervention will lead to calamitous consequences such as reality distortion, cautious observation is strongly advised.
